name: part_009
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠】わためぇ Night Fever!! in Zepp Tokyo [P_ptI5iH7Vg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Hurry Love' concludes with energetic choreography.
Intermission with the stage dark and audience applauding.
MC section where Watame greets the audience and interacts with fans.

subtitles.original: タイムを君は　掻き回せさ
subtitles.english: Keep stirring up the time.

subtitles.original: 溢れ出したんだ
subtitles.english: It's started to overflow.

subtitles.original: もう目覚めて
subtitles.english: Now, wake up.

subtitles.original: あー、こんばんどどどー！
subtitles.english: Ah, Konban-dododo!

subtitles.original: ちょっと水飲んでもいいかな？
subtitles.english: Can I drink some water?

subtitles.original: いいかな？
subtitles.english: Is it okay?

subtitles.original: みんな、こんばんどう、ぞ... あはは
subtitles.english: Everyone, welcome... haha

subtitles.original: ちょっと水飲みますね。
subtitles.english: I'm going to drink some water now.

subtitles.original: あー、水うめーなー。
subtitles.english: Ah, water tastes so good.

subtitles.original: 謎な拍手。あははは。
subtitles.english: Mysterious applause. Hahaha.

subtitles.original: 水って、うめぇね！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Water is delicious! Yay!

subtitles.original: 水って、うめぇよなー！
subtitles.english: Water really is the best!

subtitles.original: あはは、なんだろうね。えー、
subtitles.english: Hahaha, what was that? Uhm,

subtitles.original: 角巻わため 1st Live
subtitles.english: Tsunomaki Watame 1st Live:

subtitles.original: わためぇ Night Fever!! in Zepp Tokyo
subtitles.english: Watame Night Fever!! in Zepp Tokyo

subtitles.original: いよいよ始まったぞー！
subtitles.english: It's finally started!

subtitles.original: みんな、見に来てくれて本当にありがとう！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you all so much for coming! Thank you!

subtitles.original: ついにわため初の単独ソロライブ。
subtitles.english: Finally, Watame's first-ever solo live concert.

subtitles.original: みんな、楽しみにしてたよなー！なー！
subtitles.english: You've all been looking forward to this, right? Right?

subtitles.original: なー！
subtitles.english: Right?!

subtitles.original: 配信見てくれてる人も楽しみにしてたよねー。
subtitles.english: I'm sure everyone watching the stream was excited too.

subtitles.original: 今日はね、ハッシュタグ「#わためソロライブ」でね、
subtitles.english: Today, I'd like you to use the hashtag "#わためソロライブ"

subtitles.original: たくさんたくさん呟いてほしいんだよなー。いいかな？
subtitles.english: and tweet about the show as much as you can. Is that okay?

subtitles.original: でも見るのに夢中か、みんな。ねー。
subtitles.english: But maybe you're all too focused on watching? Heh.

subtitles.original: わための魅力にやられてるんじゃないのー？
subtitles.english: Maybe you're being captivated by Watame's charm?

subtitles.original: やめとこうか調子乗るの、あれ、やめとこうね、あはは。
subtitles.english: Better stop getting ahead of myself. Let's stop that, haha.

subtitles.original: あ、おっ、調子に乗ってもいいってことなのかなー？
subtitles.english: Ah, oh, so it's okay to get a bit cocky?

subtitles.original: 変な動きやめとこうね。せっかくのソロライブなのにね。
subtitles.english: I'll stop these weird moves. Even though it's a special solo live.

subtitles.original: 「#わためソロライブ」でね、今日たくさんたくさん呟いてほしいなと思います！
subtitles.english: I'd love for you to tweet a whole lot using "#わためソロライブ" today!

subtitles.original: では、現地にせっかく来てくれてるみんなともね、遊びたいと思うんですけど、
subtitles.english: Now, I'd like to have some fun with everyone here at the venue,

subtitles.original: ペンライト持ってますかー？
subtitles.english: do you have your penlights ready?

subtitles.original: おっ、それ何色？ みんなそれ黄色だね！すごい！
subtitles.english: Oh, what color is that? Everyone's got yellow! Amazing!

subtitles.original: わためカラーだね！ペンライト振って振って振って！
subtitles.english: It's Watame color! Wave those penlights! Wave them, wave them!

subtitles.original: 見えてるよー！あ、うちわ持ってくれてる人もありがとうねー！見えてるよー！
subtitles.english: I see you! And thanks to those holding fans too! I see you!

subtitles.original: せっかくだから見ちゃおうかなー。
subtitles.english: Since I'm here, let me take a good look.

subtitles.original: あ、見えてるよー！最前の人たち首痛くない？
subtitles.english: Ah, I see you! People in the front row, aren't your necks hurting?

subtitles.original: わためもね、あ、大丈夫？
subtitles.english: Watame also... Ah, you're okay?

subtitles.original: わためもね、あの、みんなのお席の方に行ってね、
subtitles.english: Watame actually went to check out the seating area

subtitles.original: リハの時に見たりしたんだけどね、ちょっと前の方首痛いよね。
subtitles.english: during rehearsal, and the front row does strain the neck a bit.

subtitles.original: なんかさ、あの、イケメンのポーズみたいになっちゃうよね。
subtitles.english: It's like you're all stuck in a 'cool guy' pose.

subtitles.original: 声出せないの辛いね。受けてるのかわかんないよ。
subtitles.english: It's tough not being able to cheer out loud. I can't tell if it's landing.

subtitles.original: 滑ってないかな？大丈夫かな？
subtitles.english: Am I flopping? Is everything okay?

subtitles.original: 受けてる受けてる、あはは。
subtitles.english: You are enjoying it, hahaha.

subtitles.original: こういう時に拍手してもらえるとね、安心するので助かるよ。みんなありがとう。
subtitles.english: Hearing you applaud at times like this puts me at ease. Thanks, everyone.

subtitles.original: あとは... あとはちょっとステップとかはダメみたいなんだけどさ、
subtitles.english: Also... it seems dancing along with steps is a no-go,

subtitles.original: あの、上半身なら動かしてもいいらしいからさ、
subtitles.english: but I heard it's okay to move your upper body,

subtitles.original: 上半身でわためへの愛を伝えてもらってもいいかな？恥ずかしい？
subtitles.english: so could you show your love for Watame with your upper body? Are you shy?

subtitles.original: 何かこう、手とかさ。あ、やってくれてる！
subtitles.english: Maybe move your hands? Oh, you're doing it!

subtitles.original: あ、いいいね！フニフニダンス、いいいね！あ、いいねー！
subtitles.english: Ah, nice! The Funifuni dance, nice! Ah, nice!

subtitles.original: さすがわためぇ Night Fever!! 毎週踊ってるだけあるね！
subtitles.english: As expected of Watame Night Fever!! It shows you've been dancing every week!

subtitles.original: いや、これやってほしかったんだ、ありがとうね。
subtitles.english: Yeah, I really wanted to see this, thanks!

subtitles.original: 配信民は寂しんじゃねーの？
subtitles.english: Aren't the stream viewers feeling left out?

subtitles.original: コメント見えてますよー。
subtitles.english: I see your comments!

subtitles.original: でもね、ちょっとラグがあってね、
subtitles.english: There's a bit of a lag, but it's fine.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫、でも大丈夫、みんなが...
subtitles.english: It's fine because I'll...

subtitles.original: 何言ってくれるかちょっと予言しながら見るんで
subtitles.english: watch while predicting what you're saying.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫ですよ。いっぱいコメントしてね。
subtitles.english: So please comment a lot!

subtitles.original: あ、アッピピ？アッピピピ？アッピピ... お？
subtitles.english: Ah, Appipi? Appipipi? Appipi... Oh?

subtitles.original: 何かを受信したみたいだ、これは... 悲報！
subtitles.english: Looks like I've received a transmission... This is... Bad news!
